original: Majjhima Nikāya 80
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Vekhanasasutta
analyzed: vekhanasa sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho vekhanaso paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho vekhanasaḥ paribbājakaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho vekhanaso paribbājako bhagavato santike udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho vekhanasaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavato santike udānam udānesi

original: “ayaṁ paramo vaṇṇo, ayaṁ paramo vaṇṇo”ti.
analyzed: ayam paramaḥ vaṇṇaḥ ayam paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti

original: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, kaccāna, evaṁ vadesi:
analyzed: kim pana tva kaccāna evam vadesi

original: ‘ayaṁ paramo vaṇṇo, ayaṁ paramo vaṇṇo’ti?
analyzed: ayam paramaḥ vaṇṇaḥ ayam paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti

original: Katamo, kaccāna, so paramo vaṇṇo”ti?
analyzed: katamaḥ kaccāna so paramaḥ vaṇṇoti

original: “Yasmā, bho gotama, vaṇṇā añño vaṇṇo uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthi so paramo vaṇṇo”ti.
analyzed: yasmai bho gotama vaṇṇā aññaḥ vaṇṇo uttaritaraḥ vā paṇītataraḥ vā natthi so paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti

original: “Katamo pana so, kaccāna, vaṇṇo yasmā vaṇṇā añño vaṇṇo uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthī”ti?
analyzed: katamaḥ pana so kaccāna vaṇṇo yasmā vaṇṇāḥ aññaḥ vaṇṇo uttaritaraḥ vā paṇītataraḥ vā natthi iti

original: “Yasmā, bho gotama, vaṇṇā añño vaṇṇo uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthi so paramo vaṇṇo”ti.
analyzed: yasmai bho gotama vaṇṇā aññaḥ vaṇṇo uttaritaraḥ vā paṇītataraḥ vā natthi so paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti

original: “Dīghāpi kho te esā, kaccāna, phareyya:
analyzed: dīghā api kho te esā kaccāna phareyya

original: ‘yasmā, bho gotama, vaṇṇā añño vaṇṇo uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthi so paramo vaṇṇo’ti vadesi, tañca vaṇṇaṁ na paññapesi.
analyzed: yasmā bho gotama vaṇṇā aññaḥ vaṇṇo uttaritaraḥ vā paṇītataraḥ vā natthi so paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti vadesi tam ca vaṇṇam na paññapesi

original: Seyyathāpi, kaccāna, puriso evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: sa iyyathā api kaccāna purisaḥ evam vadeyya

original: ‘ahaṁ yā imasmiṁ janapade janapadakalyāṇī, taṁ icchāmi taṁ kāmemī’ti.
analyzed: aham yā imasmin janapade janapada kalyāṇī tam icchāmi tam kāmemi iti

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

original: ‘ambho purisa, yaṁ tvaṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ icchasi kāmesi, jānāsi taṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ—khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā’ti?
analyzed: ambho purisa yam tvam janapada kalyāṇim icchasi kāmesi jānāsi tam janapada kalyāṇi khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā ati

original: Iti puṭṭho ‘no’ti vadeyya.
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ nā uti vadeyya

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

original: ‘ambho purisa, yaṁ tvaṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ icchasi kāmesi, jānāsi taṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ
analyzed: ambho purisa yam tvam janapada kalyāṇim icchasi kāmesi jānāsi tam janapada kalyāṇi

original: evaṁnāmā evaṅgottāti vāti …pe… dīghā vā rassā vā majjhimā vā kāḷī vā sāmā vā maṅguracchavī
analyzed: evanāmā evaṅgottā ati vā ati pe dīghā vā rassā vā majjhimā vā kāḷī vā sāmā vā maṅgura chavī

original: vāti … amukasmiṁ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā’ti?
analyzed: vāti amukasmin gāme vā nigame vā nagare vāti

original: Iti puṭṭho ‘no’ti vadeyya.
analyzed: iti puṭṭhaḥ nā uti vadeyya

original: Tamenaṁ evaṁ vadeyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam evam vadeyyu

original: ‘ambho purisa, yaṁ tvaṁ na jānāsi na passasi, taṁ tvaṁ icchasi kāmesī’ti?
analyzed: ambho purisa yam tvam na jānāsi na passasi tam tvam icchasi kāmesi iti

original: Iti puṭṭho ‘āmā’ti vadeyya.
analyzed: iti vadeyya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: nanu evaṁ sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakataṁ bhāsitaṁ sampajjatī”ti?
analyzed: nanu evam sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakatam bhāsitam sampajjati iti

original: “Addhā kho, bho gotama, evaṁ sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakataṁ bhāsitaṁ sampajjatī”ti.
analyzed: addhā kho bho gotama evam sante tassa purisassa appāṭihīrakatam bhāsitam sampajjati iti

original: “Evameva kho tvaṁ, kaccāna, ‘yasmā, bho gotama, vaṇṇā añño vaṇṇo uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthi so paramo vaṇṇo’ti vadesi; tañca vaṇṇaṁ na paññapesī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho tva kaccāna yasmā bho gotama vaṇṇā aññaḥ vaṇṇo uttaritaraḥ vā paṇītataraḥ vā natthi so paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti vadesi tam ca vaṇṇam na paññapesi iti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato paṇḍukambale nikkhitto bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca, evaṁ vaṇṇo attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā”ti.
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama maṇi veḷuriyaḥ subhaḥ jātimā aṭṭhasas su parikamma kato paṇḍu kambale nikkhittaḥ bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca evam vaṇṇaḥ attā hoti arogaḥ param

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: yo vā maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṁso suparikammakato paṇḍukambale nikkhitto
analyzed: yaḥ vā maṇi veḷuriyaḥ subhaḥ jātimā aṭṭhasas su parikamma kato paṇḍu kambale nikkhitto

original: bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca, yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako imesaṁ
analyzed: bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca yaḥ vā

original: ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
analyzed: ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bho gotama, rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako, ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bho gotama ratta ndhakāra timisāya kimi khajjopanakaḥ ayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako, yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya telappadīpo, imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā ratta ndhakāra timisāya khajjopanakaḥ yaḥ vā ratta ndhakāra timisāya tela ppadīpo imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bho gotama, rattandhakāratimisāya telappadīpo, ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bho gotama ratta ndhakāra timisāya telappadīpaḥ ayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya telappadīpo, yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya mahāaggikkhandho, imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā ratta ndhakāra timisāya tela ppadīpaḥ yaḥ vā ratta ndhakāra timisāya mahā aggi khandho imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bho gotama, rattandhakāratimisāya mahāaggikkhandho, ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bho gotama rattandhakāratimisāya mahā aggi kkhandhaḥ ayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya mahāaggikkhandho, yā vā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ viddhe
analyzed: yaḥ vā ratta ndhakāra timisāya mahā aggi kkhandhaḥ yā vā rattiyā paccūsa samayam viddhe

original: vigatavalāhake deve osadhitārakā, imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro
analyzed: vigata valāhake deve osadhi tārakā imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ

original: ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
analyzed: ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bho gotama, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ viddhe vigatavalāhake deve osadhitārakā, ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bho gotama rattiyā paccūsa samayam viddhe vigata valāhake deve osadhi tārakā ayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: yā vā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ viddhe vigatavalāhake deve osadhitārakā, yo vā tadahuposathe
analyzed: yā vā rattiyā paccūsa samayam viddhe vigata valāhake deve osadhi tārakā yā vā tad ahu posathe

original: pannarase viddhe vigatavalāhake deve abhido aḍḍharattasamayaṁ cando, imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ
analyzed: pannarase viddhe vigata valāhake deve abhidaḥ aḍḍha ratta samayam cando

original: vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
analyzed: vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bho gotama, tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalāhake deve abhido aḍḍharattasamayaṁ cando, ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bho gotama tadahu posathe pannarase viddhe vigata valāhake deve abhidaḥ aḍḍha ratta samayam candaḥ ayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kaccāna,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kaccāna

original: yo vā tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalāhake deve abhido aḍḍharattasamayaṁ
analyzed: yaḥ vā tadah uposathe pannarase viddhe vigata valāhake deve abhidaḥ aḍḍha ratta samaya

original: cando, yo vā vassānaṁ pacchime māse saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve abhido
analyzed: candaḥ yaḥ vā vassānam pacchime māse sarada samaye viddhe vigata valāhake deve abhidaḥ

original: majjhanhikasamayaṁ sūriyo, imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
analyzed: majjhanhika samayam sūriyaḥ imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bho gotama, vassānaṁ pacchime māse saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve
analyzed: bho gotama vassānam pacchime māse sarada samaye viddhe vigata valāhake deve

original: abhido majjhanhikasamayaṁ sūriyo—ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: abhidaḥ majjhanhika samayam sūriyoayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati

original: “Ato kho te, kaccāna, bahū hi bahutarā devā ye imesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ ābhā nānubhonti, tyāhaṁ pajānāmi.
analyzed: atas kho te kaccāna bahū hi bahutarāḥ devāḥ ye imesam candima sūriyānam ābhā na anubhonti tyā aham pajānāmi

original: Atha ca panāhaṁ na vadāmi:
analyzed: atha ca pana aham na vadāmi

original: ‘yasmā vaṇṇā añño vaṇṇo uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca natthī’ti.
analyzed: yasmai vaṇṇā aññaḥ vaṇṇo uttaritaro ca paṇītataro ca natthi iti

original: Atha ca pana tvaṁ, kaccāna, ‘yvāyaṁ vaṇṇo kiminā khajjopanakena nihīnataro ca patikiṭṭhataro ca so paramo vaṇṇo’ti vadesi; tañca vaṇṇaṁ na paññapesi.
analyzed: atha ca pana tva kaccāna yvā ayam vaṇṇaḥ kiminā khajjopanakena nihīnataraḥ ca patikiṭṭhataraḥ ca so paramaḥ vaṇṇo ti vadesi tam ca vaṇṇam na paññapesi

original: Pañca kho ime, kaccāna, kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: pañca kho ime kaccāna kāmaguṇā

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: sotaviññeyyā saddā …pe…
analyzed: sota viññeyyā saddāḥ pe

original: ghānaviññeyyā gandhā …
analyzed: ghāna viññeyyāḥ gandhāḥ

original: jivhāviññeyyā rasā …
analyzed: jivhā viññeyyāḥ rasāḥ

original: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
analyzed: kāya viññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: ime kho, kaccāna, pañca kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: ime kho kaccāna pañca kāmaguṇā

original: Yaṁ kho, kaccāna, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ idaṁ vuccati kāmasukhaṁ.
analyzed: yam kho kaccāna ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassam idam vuccati kāma sukha

original: Iti kāmehi kāmasukhaṁ, kāmasukhā kāmaggasukhaṁ tattha aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
analyzed: iti kāmehi kāma sukha kāma sukhā kāmagga sukham tattha aggam akkhāyati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, vekhanaso paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte vekhanasaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: acchariya bho gotama abbhuta bho gotama

original: Yāva subhāsitañcidaṁ bhotā gotamena:
analyzed: bhotā gotamena

original: ‘kāmehi kāmasukhaṁ, kāmasukhā kāmaggasukhaṁ tattha aggamakkhāyatī’ti.
analyzed: kāmehi kāma sukha kāma sukhā kāmagga sukham tattha aggam akkhāyati iti

original: ‘Kāmehi, bho gotama, kāmasukhaṁ, kāmasukhā kāmaggasukhaṁ, tattha aggamakkhāyatī’”ti
analyzed: kāmehi bho gotama kāma sukha kāma sukhā kāmagga sukha tattha aggam akkhāyati iti

original: “dujjānaṁ kho etaṁ, kaccāna, tayā aññadiṭṭhikena aññakhantikena aññarucikena aññatrayogena aññatrācariyakena—
analyzed: dujjānam kho eta kaccāna tayā añña diṭṭhikena añña khantikena añña rucikena añña trayogena aññatra ācariyakena

original: kāmā vā kāmasukhaṁ vā kāmaggasukhaṁ vā.
analyzed: kāmāḥ vā kāma sukham vā kāmagga sukham vā

original: Ye kho te, kaccāna, bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā te kho etaṁ jāneyyuṁ—
analyzed: ye kho te kaccāna bhikkhū arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ vusitavantaḥ kata karaṇīyāḥ ohita bhārāḥ an uppatta sadatthā parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā sammad aññā vimuttā te kho etam jāneyyu

original: kāmā vā kāmasukhaṁ vā kāmaggasukhaṁ vā”ti.
analyzed: kāmāḥ vā kāma sukham vā kāmagga sukham vā ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, vekhanaso paribbājako kupito anattamano bhagavantaṁyeva khuṁsento bhagavantaṁyeva vambhento bhagavantaṁyeva vadamāno:
analyzed: evam vutte vekhanasaḥ paribbājakaḥ kupitaḥ anatta manaḥ bhagavantayā iva khusentaḥ bhagavantayā iva vambhentaḥ bhagavantayā iva vadamānaḥ

original: “samaṇo gotamo pāpito bhavissatī”ti bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ pāpitaḥ bhavissati iti bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “evameva panidhekacce samaṇabrāhmaṇā ajānantā pubbantaṁ, apassantā aparantaṁ atha ca pana
analyzed: evam eva panidhā ikacce samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ a jānantāḥ pubbanta a passantāḥ aparantam atha ca pana

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti—pajānāmā’ti—paṭijānanti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya atipajānāma atipaṭijānanti

original: Tesamidaṁ bhāsitaṁ hassakaṁyeva sampajjati, nāmakaṁyeva sampajjati, rittakaṁyeva sampajjati, tucchakaṁyeva sampajjatī”ti.
analyzed: tesam idam bhāsitam hassakayā iva sampajjati nāmakayā iva sampajjati rittakayā iva sampajjati tucchakayā iva sampajjati iti

original: “Ye kho te, kaccāna, samaṇabrāhmaṇā ajānantā pubbantaṁ, apassantā aparantaṁ,
analyzed: ye kho te kaccāna samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ a jānantā pubbanta a passantā aparanta

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti—pajānāmā’ti—paṭijānanti;
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya atipajānāma atipaṭijānanti

original: tesaṁ soyeva sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.
analyzed: tesam saḥ yeva sahadhammikaḥ niggahaḥ hoti

original: Api ca, kaccāna, tiṭṭhatu pubbanto, tiṭṭhatu aparanto.
analyzed: api ca kaccāna tiṭṭhatu pubba antaḥ tiṭṭhatu apara antaḥ

original: Etu viññū puriso asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko, ahamanusāsāmi ahaṁ dhammaṁ desemi.
analyzed: etu viññū purisaḥ asaṭhaḥ a māyāvī uju jātikaḥ aham anusāsāmi aham dhammaṃ desemi

original: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ tathā paṭipajjamāno nacirasseva sāmaññeva ñassati sāmaṁ dakkhiti—
analyzed: yathā anusiṭṭham tathā paṭipajjamānaḥ nacirassa iva sāmaññā iva ñassati sāmam dakkhiti

original: evaṁ kira sammā bandhanā vippamokkho hoti, yadidaṁ avijjā bandhanā.
analyzed: evam kira sammā bandhanā vippamokkhaḥ hoti yat idam avijjā bandhanā

original: Seyyathāpi, kaccāna, daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddho assa suttabandhanehi;
analyzed: seyyathā api kaccāna daharaḥ kumāraḥ mandaḥ uttānaseyyakaḥ kaṇṭha pañcamehi bandhanehi baddhaḥ assa sutta bandhanehi

original: tassa vuddhimanvāya indriyānaṁ paripākamanvāya tāni bandhanāni mucceyyuṁ;
analyzed: tassa vuddhim anvāya indriyānam paripākam anvāya tāni bandhanāni mucceyyu

original: so mokkhomhīti kho jāneyya no ca bandhanaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ mokkhaḥ asmi iti kho jāneyya no ca

original: Evameva kho, kaccāna, etu viññū puriso asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko, ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṁ dhammaṁ desemi;
analyzed: evam eva kho kaccāna etu viññū purisaḥ asaṭhaḥ a māyāvī uju jātikaḥ aham anusāsāmi aham dhammaṃ desemi

original: yathānusiṭṭhaṁ tathā paṭipajjamāno nacirasseva sāmaññeva ñassati, sāmaṁ dakkhiti:
analyzed: yathā anusiṭṭham tathā paṭipajjamānaḥ nacirassa iva sāmaññā iva ñassati sāmam dakkhiti

original: ‘evaṁ kira sammā bandhanā vippamokkho hoti, yadidaṁ avijjā bandhanā’”ti.
analyzed: evam kira sammā bandhanā vippamokkhaḥ hoti yat idam avijjā bandhanā ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, vekhanaso paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte vekhanasaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama …pe…
analyzed: abhikkanta bho gotama pe

original: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Vekhanasasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dasamaṁ.
analyzed: vekhanasa suttam niṭṭhitam dasama

original: Paribbājakavaggo niṭṭhito tatiyo.
analyzed: paribbājaka vaggaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ tatiyaḥ

original: Tassuddānaṁ
analyzed: tassa uddāna

original: Puṇḍarī aggisaha kathināmo,
analyzed: puṇḍarī aggisaha

original: Dīghanakho puna bhāradvājagotto;
analyzed: dīghanakhaḥ puna bhāradvāja gottaḥ

original: Sandakaudāyimuṇḍikaputto,
analyzed: sandaka odāyi muṇḍika putto

original: Maṇiko tathākaccāno varavaggo.
analyzed: maṇiko tathā akaccānaḥ vara vaggo
